title: dataset
description: A dataset in a DataLad Catalog

name.description: The long name of the dataset
name.title: Name

short_name.description: The short name of the dataset
short_name.title: Short name

description.description: A 1-2 paragraph description of the dataset
description.title: Description

url.description: The location of the datalad dataset's annex
url.title: URL

license.description: The license under which the dataset is made available

url.description: A URL where a description of the license can be viewed
url.title: URL

access_request_contact.description: The contact details of the person/office from which to request access to the dataset content
access_request_contact.title: Access Request Contact

givenName.description: The author's given name, such as 'John'
givenName.title: Given name

familyName.description: The author's last/family name, such as 'Doe'
familyName.title: Family name

name.description: A concatenation of the honorificSuffix, givenName and familyName properties, such as 'Dr. John Doe'
name.title: Name

email.description: Email address of the author, such as johndoe@example.com
email.title: Email

honorificSuffix.description: Title of the author, such as 'Dr.'
honorificSuffix.title: Honorific suffix

identifier.description: The actual identifier, such as the ORCID ID '0000-1212-5566'
identifier.title: Identifier

access_request_url.description: The url of the online location from which to request access to the dataset content
access_request_url.title: Access Request URL

keywords.description: Tags or keywords describing the dataset
keywords.title: Keywords

funding.description: Sources of funding for the dataset
funding.title: Funding

name.description: Name of the funding source, such as a funder or grant scheme
name.title: Name

identifier.description: Identifier of the fund, such as a grant number
identifier.title: Identifier

description.description: Free form description of grant or funding
description.title: Description

type.description: Type of publication, such as a scholarly article, book, blog post
type.title: Type

publicationOutlet.description: The publication outlet / venue, such as the journal, publisher name, or news outlet
publicationOutlet.title: Publication outlet

dataset_path.description: The subdataset PATH relative to its parent
dataset_path.title: Dataset path

additional_display.description: Additional items to display in tabs on dataset page
additional_display.title: Additional display

name.description: Name of the section that will appear as the tab name
name.title: Name

content.description: The content that will appear in the tab when opened, specified as key-value pairs
content.title: Content

icon.description: An icon from the Font Awesome Free collection (v6.1.1), e.g. 'fas fa-database', that will be displayed in the tab heading
icon.title: icon

top_display.description: Additional items to display at the top of the dataset page (along with keywords, description, etc)
top_display.title: Top display

name.description: Name of the item that will appear as part of the top display
name.title: Name

value.description: Value of the item that will appear as part of the top display
value.title: Value
